text: Eghtɨ mongamin nguibar ekiar vamɨra ikɨ, kamaghɨn deraghan kogham. Nguibar ekiar vamɨra ikɨ bar saghon mar ikɨtɨ, gumazim uan anavɨn ovevem ikarvaghsɨ, bar anɨngaghegh pamtem arɨmangamin gumazir kamɨn gɨntɨgh, tuavimɨn puram an suiragh a mɨsueghtɨ an aremegham. Gumazir kam, guizbangɨra, osɨmtɨziba puvatɨ. A uan anavɨn apanim gamua a mɨsoghezɨ an aremezir puvatɨ. Sobiamrama asiaghirɨgha anemɨsoghezɨ an areme.
